page.title: 03Yarm Twin Town _ VERNOUILLET
page.content: Officially twinning with Yarm in May 1985 Vernouillet also has twin towns in Germany (Hainburg)and Austria (Alberndors and Truman).Pupils from Conyers School have had exchange visits with pupils from Collage Emile Zola(350 pupils aged 11-16) on two occasions,April and June 1984,April and May 1985. Other visits that have taken place:April 1985 Yarm Town boys football club: May a delegation from the Parish Council and the Twinning committee went for the formal signing of the twinning agreement: May the Worsall Folk Dancers spent a few days there.Unofficial trips (in both directions)have taken place. Vernouillet is a small town situated a few miles west of Paris.There is little industry there but Renault and Talbot factories are nearby.
